mapper.select: SELECT t1.user_real_name,t2.id,t3.role_name FROM t_user t1, t_sys_user_role t2, t_sys_role t3 WHERE t1.id = t2.user_id AND t2.role_id = t3.id
SELECT t3.id FROM t_sys_user_role t1, t_sys_role_permission t2, t_sys_permission t3 WHERE t1.role_id = t2.role_id AND t2.permission_id = t3.id and t1.user_id = #{userId}
